## CredentialStatusResolverRegistry class

CredentialStatusResolverRegistry is a registry of CredentialStatusResolver

 CredentialStatusResolverRegistry

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CredentialStatusResolverRegistry
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [get(type)](./js-sdk.credentialstatusresolverregistry.get.md) |  | resolve is a method to resolve a credential status from the the spefic source. |
